pages.text: Should you wish to hide underground from the horrors of the surface in the $(thing)Abyss$(), you may take comfort in knowing of the blood-red minerals that can be found down there.
pages.title: Ores

pages.text: $(thing)Bloodstone Ore$() can be harvested with a pickaxe, dropping $(thing)Bloodstones$() and some xp.$(br2)$(thing)Bloodstones$() can be found almost anywhere in the abyssal underground, and can be used for a variety of purposes, such as new weapons or armour.
